summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Investment Tracker app. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend functionality working correctly with demo login, portfolio management, alerts system, and real-time price integration.

design_issues.issue: Minor DOM attachment error when rapidly toggling alerts

passed_tests: Demo user creation and login with credentials demo@inversiones.com/demo123
Portfolio summary calculation showing 5 assets with $3,259,800 investment
Real-time price fetching from Yahoo Finance (AAPL: $278.12, GOOGL: $322.86, MSFT: $401.14)
Assets CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Alerts CRUD operations with pause/reactivate functionality
Navigation between Dashboard, Assets, Alerts, and History tabs
Add asset modal opening and closing
Add alert modal opening and closing
Portfolio calculations showing gains/losses and percentages

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor DOM issue with rapid alert toggling)
